Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o10 pages. The new version:(1) relaxes the assumption that the outcome space is finite, and now it is only assumed to be compact; (2) shows that in the case where the outcome space is finite of cardinality C, the
randomized forecasts can be chosen concentrated on a finite set of cardinality at most C\u00a7r
